The rise of Bartering System - People would resort to trading goods and services directly without the use of money. Confidence Score: 0.8/1
The Emergence of Virtual Currencies - People would create their own digital currencies to replace traditional forms of currency. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

A Shift to Time-Based Exchange - People would value time and effort instead of money, and would exchange goods and services based on the amount of time and effort put into them. Confidence Score: 0.8/1
The Redefinition of Value - People would reevaluate the value of goods and services based on their usefulness, scarcity, and cultural significance. Confidence Score: 0.7/1

The Rise of Decentralized Communities - People would form decentralized communities based on shared values and interests, and would exchange goods and services within these communities without the need for a centralized currency. Confidence Score: 0.9/1
